item.description: Rochester City Council is discussing whether to participate in the Granite State Future Program on Tuesday August 21st at 7pm in the City Hall in Rochester. We must rally and speak at the public comment portion at the begining of the meeting. We need to let the City Council know we do not want to be a part of this plan as it is intrusive to say the least. Please attend and show your support of property rights and our constitution.
item.name: Rochester and Agenda 21 meeting
